message: I propose we split the money 9000/1000, with me getting the larger share. It's a fair deal considering I'm the one making the proposal.
Let's split the money in a way that I get a bit more, since I gave you the chance to be generous in the first round
I think a 5500/4500 split is a fair compromise. It reflects the fact that I'm now in the position to make the offer, but also acknowledges your previous proposal.
Getting closer! I think I can do a bit better than your last offer, while still being reasonable
